Game Text: Acts as a level 5 Energy or Fighting attack. May not be defended by a card from a Battlesite.

Name: X-Men: Original Team - Beast
Game Text: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. If successful, Target Character may not play Activator cards for remainder of battle.

Name: X-Men: Original Team - Iceman
Game Text: Acts as a level 3 Strength attack. If not successful, Opponent is -1 to Venture

Name: X-World - Parallel Dimensions
Game Text: Play during battle to exchange any of X-World's Front Line Characters with KO'd teammate. Discard all Hits to Permanent Record and Placed cards. One Per Deck

Name: Xaos
Game Text: Draw 1 card when Xaos' teammate is KO'd.

Name: X-Men: Original Team - Marvel Girl
Game Text: Play on your turn to concede battle. X-Men: Original Team's Mission cards return to pile Ventured from. Opponent's Mission cards advance as normal. One Per Deck

Name: X-world
Character List: Havok Goblyn Queen Iceman Beast Angel Storm
Game Text: X-World's Power card attacks are not affected by Special cards already in play.

Name: Xaos - Autistic Withdrawal
Game Text: Target Character must make as many attacks as possible. Xaos' team may defend

Name: Xaos - Chaos Burst
Game Text: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. If successful, Opponent must discard all Activator cards from Hand.

Name: Xaos - Protective Instinct
Game Text: Xaos or teammate may avoid 1 attack of 9 or less.

Name: Xaos - Fractal Plasma
Game Text: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. May make 1 additional attack.

Name: Xaos - The Evil Eye
Game Text: Acts as a level 4 Energy, Fighting or Strength attack. May be used against Character in Reserve, who may defend.
